ThingDef.Name: Itzal_ChargeBPistol_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Burst Charge Pistol
ThingDef.description: A charged-shot, burst-fire pistol. Fires two shots in very quick succession. Very light for a pistol.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: Itzal_ChargeChainShotgun_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Charge Chain Shotgun
ThingDef.description: A charged-shot, fully-automatic chain shotgun. High risk and high reward, thanks to its high damage and low accuracy.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: Itzal_ChargeBullpup_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Bullpup Charge Rifle
ThingDef.description: A charged-shot assault rifle, configured like a typical bullpup assault rifle. Longer range, but less damage.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: Itzal_ConvCAR_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Modified assault rifle
ThingDef.description: A assault rifle that's been converted to a charged weapon. Not as good as an actual charge rifle, but it will do the job.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: Itzal_ChargeCC_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Charge Concealed Carry
ThingDef.description: A tiny, concealable version of a charge pistol. The cheapest charge weapon money can buy.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: Itzal_ChargeConcRifle_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Concussion rifle
ThingDef.description: A charged-shot rifle that fires a large, slow-moving projectile that explodes in a small radius when it hits something.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: Itzal_ChargeCPistol_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Cycle Pistol
ThingDef.description: A charged-shot, high-tech, rapid-fire pistol. Very expensive, but packs a lot of firepower in a small package.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: Itzal_ChargeDB_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Charge Double-Barreled Shotgun
ThingDef.description: A charged-shot, double-barrel shotgun. Slow to reload, but immense damage.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: Itzal_ChargeDMR_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Charge DMR
ThingDef.description: A charged-shot designated marksman rifle. Semi-automatic with a decent firerate, damage, and range.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: Itzal_HChargeRifle_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Heavy Charge Rifle
ThingDef.description: A heavy version of the charged-shot assault rifle. Fires four accurate, high-damage shots.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: Itzal_HCSMG_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona High-Capacity Charge SMG
ThingDef.description: A charged-shot submachine gun with a helical magazine to hold more ammo. Fires a burst of five rounds.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: Itzal_ChargeHPistol_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Heavy Charge Pistol
ThingDef.description: A charged-shot, high-caliber pistol. Hits like a truck, but weighs a ton.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: Itzal_ChargeHR_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Charge Hunting Rifle
ThingDef.description: An ornate, charged-shot hunting rifle, often taken to various Rimworlds by Glitterworld thrumbo hunters. High AP capability.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: Itzal_ChargeSLauncher_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Charge Salvo Launcher
ThingDef.description: A charged-shot salvo launcher. Fires a nine-shot burst, but has a high cooldown time.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.

ThingDef.Name: Itzal_ChargePFRifle_Bond
ThingDef.label: persona Charge Pathfinder Rifle
ThingDef.description: A lightweight version of a charged-shot assault rifle designed for paratroopers and caravans.\n\nThis weapon has an onboard persona that can bond to only a single person. The wielder and intelligent weapon can synchronize their reflexes and attack with frightening speed, accuracy, and creativity. Once bonded to a wielder, the weapon's persona will refuse to be wielded by anyone else.
